Text_Spanish: No tiene nada del otro mundo

Text_English: I see no reason for doing that
Text_Spanish: No veo razón para hacer eso

Text_English: I don't get it - Too complicated
Text_Spanish: No lo pillo - Es demasiado complicado
Ya le di una vuelta a aquello
Me vas a pisar lo fregado!

Text_English: Do you know if WC is usable today?
Text_Spanish: Sabes si el aseo está usable hoy?

Text_English: It always works. It's you and all the scum living here who think you are highborn
Text_Spanish: Claro que funciona. Tú y toda la morralla que vivís aquí os pensáis que sois marqueses

Text_English: It's downstairs as always! Be fast. Now there is nobody using it
Text_Spanish: Está en el piso de abajo como siempre! Sé rápido. Ahora mismo no hay nadie usándolo

Text_English: Well! Have a nice day Reme!
Text_Spanish: Bueno! Que tengas un florido día Reme!
